sentences.sContent: On a day of brilliant sunshine,we went camping.
sentences.sContent_eng: On a day of brilliant sunshine,we went camping.
sentences.sCn: 在一个阳光明媚的日子，我们去野营。

sentences.sContent: He went camping with a knife stuck in his belt each time.
sentences.sContent_eng: He went camping with a knife stuck in his belt each time.
sentences.sCn: 他每次去露营都佩带腰刀。

sentences.sContent: Once they went camping with friends who had moved to Alaska.
sentences.sContent_eng: Once they went camping with friends who had moved to Alaska.
sentences.sCn: 有一次，他们和几个搬到阿拉斯加的朋友去野营。
